alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 02 at 1:48PM PST until January 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ALONG BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph with more exposed areas seeing gusts to 65 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Coast along beaches and headlands. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be accompanied by heavy rain.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
